word:
It was a costly sacrifice that the Lord of heaven made. Divine benevolence was stirred to its unfathomable 
                                                                           60
depths; it was impossible for God to give more. He "so loved the world, that He gave His only-begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in Him should not perish, but have everlasting life." John 3:16. Why is our gratitude so limited? It is only as a ripple on the surface, compared with the great tide of love that flows to us from the Father.
